alert.note: Alert for Brown (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 9:20PM CST until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Valley City. Illinois River at Meredosia. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at La Grange LD. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at La Grange LD. * WHEN...From late Monday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Extensive wetland acreage south of La Grange begins flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Friday the stage was 20.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Tuesday morning and continue rising to 24.8 feet Thursday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Illinois River La Grange LD 23.0 20.7 21.6 22.3 23.2 24.0 24.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
